parameters.name: Digest
parameters.description: The Digest Header header as defined in [RFC3230] contains a Hash of the message body. The only hash algorithms that may be used to calculate the Digest within the context of this specification are SHA-256 and SHA-512 as defined in [RFC5843]. For POST with 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' content type Digest should be calculated for normalized string created from request parameters like this: 'param1=value1&param2=value2'. It is important that parameters should be placed in alphabetic order

parameters.name: Signature
parameters.description: A signature of request by the TPP on application level. The process of signing a request is described in 'Signing HTTP Messages' RFC draft version 10 (https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-cavage-http-signatures-10). The request signature needs to be sent in the 'Signature' HTTP header as described in the RFC. Additional requirements from Nordea - The only allowed algorithm is RSA-SHA256 - The key size for the used RSA key pair has to be at least 2048 bit - The keyId is the clientId of your application originating from the Nordea Developer Portal - We require the following headers to be used in the signature * Request without body: (request-target) X-Nordea-Originating-Host X-Nordea-Originating-Date * Request with body: (request-target) X-Nordea-Originating-Host X-Nordea-Originating-Date Content-type Digest * The request-target is a combination of the HTTP action verb and the request URI path

parameters.name: X-IBM-Client-Id
parameters.description: Id of the Client

parameters.name: X-IBM-Client-Secret
parameters.description: Secret password generated for the Client

parameters.name: X-Nordea-Originating-Date
parameters.description: HTTP header element for date and time represented as RFC 7231 Full Dates (GMT). Example date: **Wed, 24 Apr 2019 14:00:37 GMT**. It is similar to standard HTTP 'Date' expect that it allows to set it under JavaScript in browser while standard 'Date' is forbidden

parameters.name: X-Nordea-Originating-Host
parameters.description: HTTP header element for specification of the domain name of the server. It is similar to standard HTTP 'Host' header but it won't be overridden by proxies. It also allows to set it under JavaScript in browser while standard 'Host' is forbidden

parameters.name: X-Nordea-Originating-User-Agent
parameters.description: End user (i.e. PSU) agent information, to be provided if TPP is in session with the PSU

parameters.name: X-Nordea-Originating-User-Ip
parameters.description: End user (i.e. PSU) IP address, to be provided if TPP is in session with the PSU

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Request to create a new payment.

401.description:
Unauthorized with failure code:
* error.apikey.missing = Missing API key. This operation requires API key, but it was missing.
* error.token = Unspecified error with supplied token.
* error.token.invalid = Missing access token or token did not authorized requested operation. This operation requires valid access token, but it was missing.
* error.token.expired = Access token has expired.

Forbidden with failure code:

The request signature needs to be sent in the 'Signature' HTTP header as described in the RFC. Additional requirements from Nordea - The only allowed algorithm is RSA-SHA256 - The key size for the used RSA key pair has to be at least 2048 bit - The keyId is the clientId of your application originating from the Nordea Developer Portal - We require the following headers to be used in the signature * Request without body: (request-target) X-Nordea-Originating-Host X-Nordea-Originating-Date * Request with body: (request-target) X-Nordea-Originating-Host X-Nordea-Originating-Date Content-type Digest * The request-target is a combination of the HTTP action verb and the request URI path

AlternativeOrderingCustomerResponse.title: AlternativeOrderingCustomerResponse
AlternativeOrderingCustomerResponse.description:
Information of alternative ordering customer.
In addition to the account owner, this field identifies the customer that is authorised by the account owner/account-servicing institution to order the transaction in the message.

country.description: Country of the creditor bank. Only ISO 3166 alpha-2 codes are used.

Bank.title: Bank
Bank.description:
Creditor bank information.
Provided creditor bank information (bank_code, name and address lines) is overwritten in the response with the official information for the bank stored in Nordea's register.

CrossBorderDk.title: CrossBorderDk

authorizer_id.description: Corporate Netbank logon of the user requesting the payment.

charges_rule.description:
Rule for charges.
* SHA = The Payer (sender of the payment) will pay all fees charged by the sending bank. The Payee (recipient of the payment) will pay all fees charged by the receiving bank.
* OUR = The Payer (sender of the payment) will bear all of the payment transaction fees. The beneficiary will receive the full amount of the payment.

currency.description: Currency code of the payment. Only ISO 4217 three-letter code is accepted.

end_to_end_id.description:
Identification assigned by the initiating party to unambiguously identify the transaction. 
This identification is passed on, unchanged, throughout the entire end-to-end chain. Only used in SEPA Credit Transfers.

exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate agreed with Nordea. If the exchange rate was not agreed, this field should not be provided.

exchange_rate_reference.description: Contains Forward Contract number or the name of Nordea's representative.

external_id.description: Unique identification as defined by the PISP (Payment Initiation Service Provider) to identify the payment.

requested_execution_date.description: Date of payment execution requested by user. Default is current date.

send_as_currency.description:
Currency code to be used when the payment amount is entered in other than debtor account currency. 
Only ISO 4217 three-letter code is accepted.

sepa_purpose_code.description: The purpose code of the credit transfer as defined for SEPA Credit Transfer. Only used in SEPA Credit Transfers.

urgency.description:
Urgency of the payment.
* NORMAL = Non-urgent payment (default)
* URGENT = Urgent payment

intermediary_bank.description:
Information of intermediary bank.
This is used if the beneficiary requests that the payment should be sent via another bank to the beneficiary's bank.

alternative_ordering_customer.description:
Information of alternative ordering customer.
In addition to the account owner, this field identifies the customer that is authorised by the account owner/account-servicing institution to order the transaction in the message.

ultimate_debtor.description: Details of the ultimate debtor. Ultimate debtor identifies the party that owes the cash to the Creditor as a result of receipt of goods or services. Only used in SEPA Credit Transfers.

ultimate_creditor.description: Details of ultimate creditor. Ultimate party to which an amount of money is due. Only used in SEPA Credit Transfers.

allOf.title: CrossBorderDk
allOf.description:
Template id CROSS_BORDER_DK is used to initiate a currency transfer where the debtor account in any currency is in Nordea Denmark.
Creditor account in any currency is in any bank. It also covers SEPA Credit Transfers in Euro to the banks in SEPA area.

CrossBorderDk.description:
Template id CROSS_BORDER_DK is used to initiate a currency transfer where the debtor account in any currency is in Nordea Denmark.
Creditor account in any currency is in any bank. It also covers SEPA Credit Transfers in Euro to the banks in SEPA area.

instructions_to_nordea.example: Process this as 0-value-dated payment with a due-date August 10, 2020.
instructions_to_nordea.description:
Instructions to Nordea how to handle the payment (e.g. debit date, intermediary bank). 
However, the use of this field prevents automatic processing of the payment, so the payment will be processed manually.

* SAME_DAY_VALUE = Same day value payment

FinancialPaymentAlternativeOrderingCusto.title: FinancialPaymentAlternativeOrderingCustomerFi
FinancialPaymentAlternativeOrderingCusto.description:
Information of alternative ordering customer.
In addition to the account owner, this field identifies the customer that is authorised by the account owner/account-servicing institution to order the transaction in the message.

country.description: Creditor's country. Only ISO 3166 alpha-2 codes are used.

line1.description: First line of creditor bank's address.

line2.description: Second line of creditor bank's address.

line3.description: Third line of creditor bank's address.

bic.description: Business identifier code (BIC) of the creditor bank.

country.description: Country of the creditor bank. Only ISO 3166 alpha-2 codes are used.

line1.description: First line of creditor's name.

currency.description: Currency of the debtor account. Only ISO 4217 three-letter code is accepted.

type.description:
Type of account number.
* IBAN = International bank account number

FinancialPaymentFi.title: FinancialPaymentFi

authorizer_id.description: Corporate Netbank logon of the user requesting the payment.

charges_rule.description:
Rule for charges.
* SHA = The Payer (sender of the payment) will pay all fees charged by the sending bank. The Payee (recipient of the payment) will pay all fees charged by the receiving bank.
* OUR = The Payer (sender of the payment) will bear all of the payment transaction fees. The beneficiary will receive the full amount of the payment.

currency.description: Currency code of the payment. Only ISO 4217 three-letter code is accepted.

external_id.description: Unique identification as defined by the PISP (Payment Initiation Service Provider) to identify the payment.

instructions_to_nordea.example: Process this as 0-value-dated payment with a due-date August 10, 2020.
instructions_to_nordea.description:
Instructions to Nordea how to handle the payment (e.g. debit date, intermediary bank). 
However, the use of this field prevents automatic processing of the payment, so the payment will be processed manually.

requested_execution_date.description: Date of payment execution requested by user. Default is current date.

send_as_currency.description:
Currency code to be used when the payment amount is entered in other than debtor account currency. 
Only ISO 4217 three-letter code is accepted.

exchange_rate_reference.description: Contains Forward Contract number or the name of Nordea's representative. Usage of this field prevents automatic processing of the payment.

intermediary_bank.description:
Information of intermediary bank.
This is used if the beneficiary requests that the payment should be sent via another bank to the beneficiary's bank.

alternative_ordering_customer.description:
Information of alternative ordering customer.
In addition to the account owner, this field identifies the customer that is authorised by the account owner/account-servicing institution to order the transaction in the message.

allOf.title: FinancialPaymentFi
allOf.description: FINANCIAL_PAYMENT_FI is used to initiate a currency transfer to any bank where the debtor account in any currency is in Nordea Finland. Creditor account in any currency is in any bank. Either the creditor or the debtor is a financial institution.

FinancialPaymentFi.description: FINANCIAL_PAYMENT_FI is used to initiate a currency transfer to any bank where the debtor account in any currency is in Nordea Finland. Creditor account in any currency is in any bank. Either the creditor or the debtor is a financial institution.

FinancialPaymentIntermediaryBankFi.title: FinancialPaymentIntermediaryBankFi
FinancialPaymentIntermediaryBankFi.description:
Information of intermediary bank.
This is used if the beneficiary requests that the payment should be sent via another bank to the beneficiary's bank.

type.description:
Type of reference number.
* RF = Global structured creditor reference
* FI_DOM = Finnish domestic reference
* INTL = Any international reference value

value.description:
Invoice reference value.
Reference provided to the creditor.

IntermediaryBank.title: IntermediaryBank
IntermediaryBank.description:
Information of intermediary bank.
This is used if the beneficiary requests that the payment should be sent via another bank to the beneficiary's bank.

href.description: Relative path to the linked resource

rel.description: Describes the nature of the link, e.g. 'details' for a link to the detailed information of a listed resource.

line1.description: First line of creditor's name.

_id.description: Unique payment identifier assigned for new payment.

alternative_ordering_customer.description:
Information of alternative ordering customer.
In addition to the account owner, this field identifies the customer that is authorised by the account owner/account-servicing institution to order the transaction in the message.

charges_rule.description:
Rule for charges.
* SHA = The Payer (sender of the payment) will pay all fees charged by the sending bank. The Payee (recipient of the payment) will pay all fees charged by the receiving bank.
* OUR = The Payer (sender of the payment) will bear all of the payment transaction fees. The beneficiary will receive the full amount of the payment.

currency.description: Currency code of the payment. Only ISO 4217 three-letter code is accepted.

end_to_end_id.description:
Identification assigned by the initiating party to unambiguously identify the transaction. 
This identification is passed on, unchanged, throughout the entire end-to-end chain.

exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate between send_as_currency and debtor account currency.

exchange_rate_reference.description: Contains Forward Contract number or the name of Nordea's representative.

external_id.description: Unique identification as defined by the PISP (Payment Initiation Service Provider) to identify the payment.

instructions_to_nordea.example: Process this as 0-value-dated payment with a due-date August 10, 2020.
instructions_to_nordea.description:
Instructions to Nordea how to handle the payment (e.g. debit date, intermediary bank). 
However, the use of this field prevents automatic processing of the payment, so the payment will be processed manually.

intermediary_bank.description:
Information of intermediary bank.
This is used if the beneficiary requests that the payment should be sent via another bank to the beneficiary's bank.

payment_status.description:
Status of the payment.
* AUTHORIZATION_PENDING = Payment instruction is undergoing authorization by account holder
* AUTHORIZATION_PARTIAL= Payment needs additional authorization
* AUTHORIZATION_FAILED = The given authorization was not correct
* PAYMENT_ACCEPTED = Payment is waiting to be executed
* PAYMENT_EXECUTED = Payment is executed
* PAYMENT_REJECTED = Payment is rejected

payment_status_reason.description: Reason behind payment status where applicable.

requested_execution_date.description: Date of payment execution requested by user. Default is current date.

send_as_currency.description:
Currency code to be used when the payment amount is entered in other than debtor account currency. 
Only ISO 4217 three-letter code is accepted.

sent_amount.description: Amount of the payment that has been sent to the creditor/creditor bank in send_as_currency.

sepa_purpose_code.description: The purpose code of the credit transfer as defined for SEPA Credit Transfer.

status_timestamp.description: Timestamp when the payment status was last updated. ISO 8601 format yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss.fffZ.

transfer_form.description: Transfer form type to be used for the payment.

urgency.description:
Urgency of the payment.
* NORMAL = Non-urgent payment (default)
* URGENT = Urgent payment
* SAME_DAY_VALUE = Same day value
* EXPRESS = Express payment in Denmark

authorization_permission.description: Permission level for the payment authorization.

PaymentAuthorization.title: PaymentAuthorization
PaymentAuthorization.description: Details of the users authorization rights.

advice_required.description: Indicates whether or not payment should provide a creditor advice.

bank.description:
Creditor bank information.
Provided creditor bank information (bank_code, name and address lines) is overwritten in the response with the official information for the bank stored in Nordea's register.

message_to_bank_statement.description: Message on beneficiary's bank statement. It's only used for Domestic credit transfer DK.

id.description: Identification of the debit account holder.

PaymentTemplateListResponse.title: PaymentTemplateListResponse
PaymentTemplateListResponse.description: Example of the template used to initiate new payment response.

template_id.description: Value that identifies request used to initiate new payment.

PaymentTemplateResponse.title: PaymentTemplateResponse
PaymentTemplateResponse.description: Example of the template used to initiate new payment.

type.description:
Type of reference number.
* RF = Global structured creditor reference
* FI_DOM = Finnish domestic reference
* OCR = Optical character recognition
* KID = Customer identification number (=Kunde ID)
* INTL = Any international reference value

message_identification.description: Original request id for correlation purposes

type.description:
Type of account number.
* IBAN = International bank account number
